bibl.title: Seven Remarks on Berenike - Coptos Road (ὁδὸς Βερενίκης) in Roman Period.
bibl.note: Preface. - First Remark: Road's Importance. - Second Remark: Region Management. - Third Remark: Payments and Fees. - Fourth Remark: Guarding [Patrols]. - Fifth Remark: Inhabitants and Laborers. - Sixth Remark: Means of Transportation. - Seventh Remark: Water Resources. - Conclusion.
